bib_record.title: Thermal neutron radiative cross sections for 6,7Li, 9Be, 10,11B, 12,13C, and 14,15N

free_txt: Counting efficiency calibrated from 50 keV to 10 MeV
Both thermal and cold neutron beams with neutron flux
at the target 5x10**7 n/cm2s and 2.3x10**8 n/cm2s
The absolute gamma -ray transition probabilities were
determined by a least-squares fit of the transition
intensities to the decay scheme assuming that the
intermediary level and the total primary transition
intensity deexciting the capture state equals the
secondary intensity populating the ground state.
